message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start the conversation with a price of $1,100,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $1,100,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to offer $850,000 for it, which I believe is a fair price considering my maximum budget.  I'm confident this is a good deal for both of us, and I'm eager to make this purchase.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was hoping to get closer to the value you place on the product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $975,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on it, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $975,000 is still a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $900,000.  This is a significant increase from my previous offer and a good compromise. I hope we can reach an agreement at this price.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, and I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $950,000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the value I've placed on the product. I'm excited to see if we can finalize the deal at this price.
